definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to rush about/to be constantly on the move
billows/great waves (fig. of a story with great momentum)

sentences.english: Optical Imaging and Aberrations, Part II. Wave Diffraction Optics
sentences.chinese: 光學成像和失常，第二部分。波衍射光學

sentences.english: These waves are known as the thickest waves in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這些波被稱爲世界上最厚波。

sentences.english: Bugfix related to optimizing Far-field data including surface-wave.
sentences.chinese: 修正了相關的優化遠場數據，包括地面波。

sentences.english: Polina also didn’t share the information with her sister.
sentences.chinese: 波琳娜也沒有把這件事告訴她的妹妹。

sentences.english: The method of noise source identification and location based on Wave Superposition Method(WSM) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於波疊加的噪聲源識別和定位方法。

sentences.english: In the control group, only continuous wave was used.
sentences.chinese: 對照組不分組，採用連續波治療。

sentences.english: Lighthill, J. Waves in Fluids. Cambridge University Press, 1978.
sentences.chinese: 《流體中的波》，劍橋大學出版社，1978年。

sentences.english: In addition, high temperature, continuous wave operation of the laser has also been achieved.
sentences.chinese: 此外，高溫，連續波運行的設計目標也已達到。

sentences.english: This wave of excess density is sound.
sentences.chinese: 這種過剩密度的波就是聲波。

sentences.english: Hence approximated sampling theorem in the wavelet packets space is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 由此建立了這種小波包子空間上的近似採樣定理。

sentences.english: In this case the wave is said to have been diffracted .
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，據說，波發生了衍射。

sentences.english: Big time, like a wavelet than his previous high of the Line of Duty.
sentences.chinese: 上大一時，小波喜歡上了一個比他高一屆的師姐。

sentences.english: The sleep spindles may be “colliding” with the sounds and blocking their progress.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠紡錘波可能與聲音“相撞“並阻止噪聲進入。

sentences.english: Prolonged pressure caused the sternum to snap in half and the ribs to break.
sentences.chinese: 大型瓦斯罐由於受到爆震波的壓擠破裂倒塌了。

sentences.english: This gives rise to the wave-like behavior of quantum states.
sentences.chinese: 這就引起量子態的類似波行爲。

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
